item.description: Go back home: [[⭐ Main ⭐]] Finished / Incomplete 1.1.1 - Be able to use top-down, bottom-up and modularisation approaches to solve problems.
Go back home: [[⭐ Main ⭐]] Finished / Incomplete 1.2.1 Understand what algorithms are and how they are expressed An algorithm is a set of steps or procedures for solving a problem.
